title: when user logout
description: This event ("disconnect") has to be emitted when a user logout/closed the browser.

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitDisconnect

title: when admin is online/offline
description: This event ("notify") has to be emitted when a admin came to online/offline.

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitNotify

title: when admin create/update/delete or reminder the meeting
description: This event ("notifyById") has to be emitted when admin create/update/delete or reminder the meeting to the participate User.

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitNotifybyid

title: Setting user online
description: This event ("set-user") has to be emitted when a user comes online.

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitSetUser

title: event
description: This event ("auth-error") has to be listened to know if any error has occurred on socket.
name: ListenAuthError

title: event
description: This event ("onlineUsersPlanner") has to be listened all the online user.
name: ListenOnlineusersplanner

title: Verification the init user
description: This event ("verify-user") has to be listened on the user's end to verify user
name: ListenVerifyuser
